Dialogue.Page: Thanks to some recent repairs on the space suits the thrusters no longer work properly (I'm looking at you Slate)
So now the OUTER WILDS VENTURES space program requires its astrounauts to learn a new skill, climbing!
To do it you need to: \\n 1. Get close to a wall.\\n 2. Climb said wall.\\n 3. Act as if you where flying the suit.\\n
Double-sided tape was added to the suits to allow better adhesion into surfaces, so don't forget it
You can also jump from the wall while you are climbing if needed
